entries.name: read_nonblock(integer[, outbuf [, opts]])    → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Similar to read, but raises EOFError at end of string unless the +exception: false+ option is passed in.

entries.name: readline(sep=$/, chomp: false)     → stringclick to toggle source
readpartial(integer[, outbuf])    → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Similar to read, but raises EOFError at end of string instead of returning nil, as well as IO#sysread does.

entries.name: sysread(integer[, outbuf])    → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Similar to read, but raises EOFError at end of string instead of returning nil, as well as IO#sysread does.
